title: Best Apple iPad Air 11-inch (2025) screen protectors
description: Keep your iPad Air 11-inch (2025) display protected with these screen protectors. The post Best Apple iPad Air 11-inch (2025) screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your iPad Air 11-inch (2025) display protected with these screen protectors.
text: The Apple iPad Air 11-inch (2025) is here with an 11-inch Liquid Retina IPS LCD display. This panel offers a 1,640 x 2,360 pixels resolution, 264ppi pixel density, and 500 nits of typical brightness. This is a scratch-resistant glass with an oleophobic coating. As the iPad Air is an expensive tablet, it will also have hefty repair bills if you happen to end up with a damaged display. This is why you need a screen protector to keep the display safe and protected from smudges, scratches, and worse. Here are the best iPad Air 11-inch (2025) screen protectors. Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away. Sale ProCase Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a protective folio screen protector with 9H hardness and full coverage. It has an ultrathin fillet and is highly responsive. It is easy to install with no worries about bubbles. It is shock-resistant, scratch-resistant, and liquid-resistant. Its advanced silicone adhesive ensures there is no residue when you are removing it. ESR UltraFit Screen Protectors (2-pack) It is a 9H rated screen protector with complete protection to the display. It offers HD clarity and a sensitive touch response. It comes with the UltraFit tray that helps with easy and bubble-free installation through a 2-step process. ESR Paper Feel Screen Protector (2-pack) This ultra-thin screen protector comes with a finely textured surface and scratch-protection. It simulates the feeling of writing/doodling on paper when using Apple Pencil. It comes with an application tray for an easy and bubble-free installation. Sale Ailun Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a tempered glass screen protector boasting 9H hardness. It has an oleophobic coating, so you do not have to worry about fingerprints or smudges on the display. Sale SPARIN Screen Protector (2-pack) This tempered glass screen protector has 9H rated hardness rating. It has a glossy finish which is oil- and scratch-resistant. It maintains display clarity and touch response. Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice. html:
The Apple iPad Air 11-inch (2025) is here with an 11-inch Liquid Retina IPS LCD display. This panel offers a 1,640 x 2,360 pixels resolution, 264ppi pixel density, and 500 nits of typical brightness. This is a scratch-resistant glass with an oleophobic coating.

As the iPad Air is an expensive tablet, it will also have hefty repair bills if you happen to end up with a damaged display. This is why you need a screen protector to keep the display safe and protected from smudges, scratches, and worse. Here are the best iPad Air 11-inch (2025) screen protectors.

Spigen GlasTR EZ Fit Screen Protector

This is Spigen's tempered glass screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It is slightly on the expensive side. It comes with EZ fit tray and alignment film that helps with hassle-free installation. The oleophobic coating will keep fingerprints away.

Sale

ProCase Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a protective folio screen protector with 9H hardness and full coverage. It has an ultrathin fillet and is highly responsive. It is easy to install with no worries about bubbles. It is shock-resistant, scratch-resistant, and liquid-resistant. Its advanced silicone adhesive ensures there is no residue when you are removing it.

ESR UltraFit Screen Protectors (2-pack)

It is a 9H rated screen protector with complete protection to the display. It offers HD clarity and a sensitive touch response. It comes with the UltraFit tray that helps with easy and bubble-free installation through a 2-step process.

ESR Paper Feel Screen Protector (2-pack)

This ultra-thin screen protector comes with a finely textured surface and scratch-protection. It simulates the feeling of writing/doodling on paper when using Apple Pencil. It comes with an application tray for an easy and bubble-free installation.

Sale

Ailun Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a tempered glass screen protector boasting 9H hardness. It has an oleophobic coating, so you do not have to worry about fingerprints or smudges on the display.

Sale

SPARIN Screen Protector (2-pack)

This tempered glass screen protector has 9H rated hardness rating. It has a glossy finish which is oil- and scratch-resistant. It maintains display clarity and touch response.
